title: WTB: Old Judge Fred Archer Card
author: oldjudge

posts.post_title: WTB: Old Judge Fred Archer Card
posts.post_content:
I am looking to purchase or trade for an 1887 Old Judge card of jockey Fred Archer. I will pay generously for the card. Please email me at [url]oldjudge@gmail.com[/url] if you have one available or you know someone who does.

Thanks--Jay
